articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Accompanying him were the vice-chairmen of the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 The head of the guards of honor of the KPA Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards made a salute towards the statues.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 Then he entered the hall where Kim Il Sung lies in state.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid homage to Kim Il Sung in the humblest reverence for the President.

articles.title: Senior Party, State, Army Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Senior Party, State, Army Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on July 8, the nation's greatest memorial day.
					 Seen standing before the statues of the great leaders was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Laid there were floral baskets in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the DPRK State Affairs Commission and in the joint name of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders who lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives. 
					
					 On the same day service personnel and people of all social strata paid high tribute to the great leaders at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Zimbabwean Party
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Zimbabwean Party
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Zimbabwe African National UnionÔºçPatriotic Front sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.
					 The floral basket was laid before the statues on July 8.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and military attaches here, a delegation of the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor, a delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and other foreigners and overseas compatriots visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on July 8, the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They made bows to the great leaders who lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives. 
					
					 On the same day the chief and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to the great leaders.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Officials, service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues and portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il across the country on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.
					 A large number of people visited the statutes on Mansu Hill
					
					 A floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was seen standing before the statues.
					
					 Laid there were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions, industrial establishments, farms and schools in Pyongyang, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Also placed there was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 Floral baskets in the names of the units of the KPA, institutions and enterprises, bouquets and flowers were also laid before the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of Pyongyang. 
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children visited the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor headed by Vice-President Nguyen Van Ngang left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: Revolutionary Drama Staged Here
articles.content:
Revolutionary Drama Staged Here
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Revolutionary drama "Following the Banner of Victory" was put on the stage at the National Theatre on Friday, the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					Watching the revolutionary drama were Kim Yong Nam and other senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and officials, those who had the honor of being received by the great leaders and persons of distinguished services in Pyongyang.
					
					The drama deals with the immortal exploits the President performed in winning the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War by decisively frustrating the U.S. imperialists' large-scale "new offensive" by dint of the Juche-oriented military strategy and tactics and original commanding art and with his noble popular traits.
					
					The performers impressively represented the history that the July 27 victory in the war was possible thanks to the total dedication of Kim Il Sung and his indefatigable efforts as he gave great affection to save a soldier of the People's Army from the jaws of death, shouldering the heavy burden of war upon himself and making a forced march to the dangerous forefront, and instilled conviction of victory into the service personnel and people.
					
					The revolutionary drama was highly acclaimed by the audience as it imbued them with immutable truth that the army and people who hold the great leader in high esteem are ever-victorious.

articles.title: Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute
articles.content:
Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is a latest vegetable research and production base housing hydroponic and sheet greenhouses and equipped with ultra-modern bioengineering research facilities.
					 The institute has made successes in the research into vegetables with high productivity and nutritive value and an effort to put greenhouse vegetable cultivation on a scientific and intensive basis.
					
					 It bred a new cabbage with strong homogeneity by applying an ultra-modern bioengineering technology.
					
					 It has made scientific researches into securing genes of nutritive vegetables with high resistance to harmful insects and disease, thus laying a foundation for breeding superior species.
					
					 Successes have also been made in acclimatizing green tomato and other nutritive vegetables, so as to make it possible to increase varieties and productivity.
					
					 The institute also developed technologies of producing hundreds of tons of fruit vegetables per hectare hydroponic greenhouse and a greenhouse-farming of a new variety of pepper.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un visited the institute in July last year and called upon its researchers and employees to do well the greenhouse farming so that citizens could get great benefit from it, and gave precious instructions to be carried out by the institute.

articles.title: New Species of Turfs Bred
articles.content:
New Species of Turfs Bred
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Turf Branch Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has recently bred new species of turfs which are highly resistant to cold, drought, disease and shade.
					 Among them is a cold-seasonal turf, which is rather fast in growing with rhizome and dark green leaves.
					
					 Another one has been applied to greening the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu, Ryanggang Province of the country, as it was acclimated to bitter cold of the northern highlands which are over 1 000 meters above sea level.
					
					 They remain verdant for 280-300 days a year.
					
					 The new species are originated from locally plants and cost low in cultivation and their technical indices reach the advanced level, said Jang Yong Il, a section chief of the institute.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Building Independent National Economy
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Building Independent National Economy
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime had paid big efforts to building the independent national economy.
					 When Korea was liberated on August 15, 1945, its economy was in a badly lopsided structure due to the Japanese imperialists' harsh colonial predatory policy.
					
					 Under such conditions Kim Il Sung advanced the line of building an independent national economy on the basis of the Juche idea.
					
					 After the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), which reduced everything of the country to ruins, he set it as the basic line for socialist economic construction to give priority to the growth of heavy industry while simultaneously developing the light industry and agriculture. And he aroused all the people to a drive for building an independent national economy under the banner of self-reliance.
					
					 True to his intention, the Korean people carried out the historic task of socialist industrialization in 14 years, though the U.S. imperialists vouched that Korea would not be able to stand on its feet even in a hundred years, and advanced dynamically along the road of self-reliance.
					
					 Consequently, the DPRK emerged an independent country with its unique structure of self-supporting economy, arousing admiration from among the developing countries desirous of independence.
					
					 In April Juche 54 (1965), the then Indonesian president stated at a meeting held in presence of Kim Il Sung that the DPRK was not shackled to any other country for its full-fledged independent national economy.
					
					 The former vice-speaker of the Russian State Duma praised the DPRK as a successful nation in building socialism, saying that all those countries which joined the SEV could not but go bankrupt, but only the DPRK could defend socialism for its independent national economy.
					
					 Thanks to the independent national economy provided by Kim Il Sung, the DPRK people are now vigorously advancing toward the building of an economic power on the principle of priority to self-development, despite the U.S.-led imperialists' persistent economic blockades.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Scheme to Set up "Cyber Defence Centre" for Invading North
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Scheme to Set up "Cyber Defence Centre" for Invading North
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The puppet Air Force of south Korea on June 30 announced that it would set up a "cyber defence centre" to "cope with the danger of cyber attack" from someone, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 South Korean warmongers are mulling setting up "the cyber defence centre" under the direct command of the air force headquarters by integrating cyber-departments operating in various units.
					
					 They, at the same time, seek a round-the-clock watch system on computer network and research and development of the latest cyber attack technology under the pretence of "blocking the north's hacking attempt and preventing leakage of military information."

articles.title: Int'l Organizations Censure S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Trade Unions
articles.content:
Int'l Organizations Censure S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Trade Unions
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The International Federation for Human Rights, the International Confederation of Trade Unions, the European Confederation of Trade Unions and the International Association against Torture made public a joint statement in denunciation of the south Korean authorities' inhuman suppression of Han Sang Gyun, chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU), according to the south Korean CBS on July 5.
					 The statement recalled that a court of south Korea sentenced Han Sang Gyun to 5 years in jail on charges of leading the all-out people's rally, adding that this is suppression of the trade unions and human rights activists critical of the "government's" labor policy and violation of labor right, arousing the concern.
					
					 Disclosing the unabated suppression, threat and severe punishment of leading members of trade unions in south Korea, it demanded the south Korean authorities halt the crackdown on the KCTU chairman and guarantee the right of the trade unions.

articles.title: S. Korean Builders Launch General Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Builders Launch General Strike
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The builders union of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions staged a general strike on July 6 opposing the Park Geun Hye group's labor misrule, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					Attending it were more than 20,000 builders.
					
					 They held a large-scale rally at the plaza of the Seoul City Office.
					
					 Speakers said what awaits builders toiling and moiling is only wage arrear or industrial disasters.
					
					 They set forth the 18-point demand of the builders union for improving the law and system on construction labor.

articles.title: U.S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Supports DPRK's Proposal for Great National Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
U.S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Supports DPRK's Proposal for Great National Conference for Reunification
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on July 2 in support of the DPRK's proposal for holding a great national conference for reunification.
					 Reunification is possible only when all members of the nation in the north and the south and overseas get united, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK's proposal serves as a golden opportunity of putting an end to the state of war on the Korean peninsula and reunifying the country independently and peacefully through the great national unity.
					
					 The statement called for making a contribution to the peace and prosperity of the country and the just peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world by achieving the national reunification, the desire of the nation.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Supports DPRK's Open Letter Calling for Holding Great Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Supports DPRK's Open Letter Calling for Holding Great Conference for Reunification
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration on July 5 issued a statement supporting an open letter of the DPRK calling for holding a great conference for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					 The statement urged the south Korean  regime to stop such trite slander as "offensive for united front" and "stereotyped action."
					
					 It called on the regime to opt for holding a great conference for reunification, though belatedly, and positively ensure exchange by people from all walks of life to this end.
					
					 It declared that the U.S. Regional Committee would make positive efforts to form a U.S. preparatory committee for holding a joint conference in solidarity with organizations of compatriots and individual personages in the U.S. who received the open letter from the north.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Meet
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Meet
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- An enlarged meeting of the Third Session of the 23rd Executive Committee of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place in Tokyo on July 3 to carry out the decision of the enlarged meeting of the Third Meeting of the 23rd Central Committee of Chongryon.
					 Present there were Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, and other executive members.
					
					 Hwang said in his report that the officials and activists under the headquarters have waged a dynamic patriotic movement to carry out the five-point tasks to usher in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan indicated by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He said the Tokyo organization will take the lead in carrying out the decision of the Chongryon Central Committee to implement all the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his important letter.
					
					 Then followed speeches. The report was adopted as a decision of the executive committee.
					
					 Jo Il Yon was elected chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Peru, Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Peru, Bangladesh
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, Federico Villareal National University of Peru and the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy held seminars and photo and book exhibitions between July 1 and 3 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Put on display were their works, and pictures and books introducing the struggle of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK all out to hasten the building of a socialist power and bring earlier the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 The general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru praised Kim Il Sung as an outstanding leader and great teacher of the Korean people and world revolutionaries.
					
					 The chairperson of the Peruvian Group for the Study of the Economic Theory of Kimilsungism, the president of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy and the secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship praised Kim Il Sung for founding the immortal Juche idea and Songun idea, defeating the U.S. and Japanese imperialists and building a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy and other speakers said Kim Il Sung was a great thinker and theoretician who performed tremendous exploits for the cause of human independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Romanian Politician
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Romanian Politician
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania, posted an article titled "Kim Il Sung, eternal President of Korean people" on its website on July 4 on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 The article said that the Korean people could be freed from the imperialists' colonial rule and build a country where they became masters as they were led by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He was the great leader, father of the people and iron-willed commander who founded the man-centred Juche idea since he embarked on the road of the revolutionary struggle in his early years and always won victories by thoroughly applying it in the revolution and construction, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 His demise was the greatest loss not only to the Korean revolution but to the world socialist movement.
					
					 Now the Korean people are working world-startling miracles and innovations in the building of a socialist power under the wise leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un who is boundlessly loyal to the idea and cause of the President.
					
					 This is greatly encouraging the world progressives aspiring after socialism.
					
					 The undying feats the President performed for the cause of the Juche revolution and the cause of global independence will be kept forever in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Is Always Alive in Hearts of Korean People and Progressive Humankind: Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Is Always Alive in Hearts of Korean People and Progressive Humankind: Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung on the 22nd anniversary of his demise, Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on July 1.
					 The statement said that the Korean people and progressive humankind are looking back with deep emotion upon the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung with boundless yearning and in reverence for him on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					
					 It stressed that he founded the immortal Juche idea and Songun idea and thus brightly indicated the road to be followed by humankind and built the socialist state centered on the popular masses on this land and consolidated the single-minded unity of the whole society as firm as a rock.
					
					 National reunification is his lifetime desire of Kim Il Sung, it said, and went on:
					
					 The line and policies for national reunification advanced by him serve as the greatest patriotic programme for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 He made great contributions to achieving the unity of the international labor movement, accomplishing the cause of global independence and defending world peace.
					
					 He is, indeed, the peerlessly national liberator and hero and benevolent father.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive humankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Venezuela
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Venezuela on July 4.
					 The general coordinator of the Federal Secretariat of the United Left Party of Venezuela was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events to praise the sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed by the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea on July 4.
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to send a message to Marshal Kim Jong Un and organize various significant political and cultural events on the 22nd anniversary of Kim Il Sung's demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Spain
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Spain
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A Spanish committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Madrid on July 4.
					 Miguel Angel Villaron, general secretary of the Democratic Workers' Party of Spain, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly hold political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits of the President on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Our Socialism Is Socialism of Juche" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on July 4 on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 The work published on April 16, Juche 83 (1994) clarifies the essential characteristics, advantages and invincibility of Korean socialism.

articles.title: Day of Sun and Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Cuba
articles.content:
Day of Sun and Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Cuba
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Havana on June 24.
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star in 2017.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on British Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on British Website
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on July 4 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives and indicates tasks for firmly preserving and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits. 
					
					 A photo of Kim Jong Un was posted on the website.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of State Affairs Commission of DPRK Celebrated by Italian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of State Affairs Commission of DPRK Celebrated by Italian Organization
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A friendly organization for supporting the DPRK in Italy issued a statement on July 2.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We, well aware of the great exploits Marshal Kim Jong Un performed in building the DPRK into a prosperous country, extend warm congratulations to him upon his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 We extend full support to socialist Korea with this significant event representing the Korean people's deep respect and trust in him as a momentum.
					
					 His election is the greatest happiness of the Korean people and serves as a fundamental guarantee enabling them to make fresh innovations and great progress in the future, too.
					
					 We will positively support socialist Korea and try to give wide publicity to the big successes being registered by the Korean people under his guidance and the might and invincibility of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Palacio de Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Palacio de Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan en ocasion del 22o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Le acompanaron los vicepresidentes del Comite Central del PTC. 
					
					Junto con sus acompanantes, el Mariscal entro en el salon donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					El jefe de la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino dio el parte de recepcion hacia las estatuas de pie.
					
					Fue depositado ante estas un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal.
					
					Junto con los participantes, el Mariscal rindio sublime homenaje a los Generalisimos.
					
					En el salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo de Kim Il Sung, el Mariscal le rindio el mas sublime homenaje junto con los participantes.

articles.title: Cuadros de partido y Estado rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cuadros de partido y Estado rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron el dia 8 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Ante las estatuas de pie de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, estaban colocados un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Fue depositado el cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el Comite de Estado y el otro a nombre comun del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC.
					
					Los visitantes rindieron homenaje a los Lideres antecesores ante sus estatuas de pie y en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos.
					
					Y recorrieron las salas de conservacion de las ordenes recibidas por los grandes Lideres y las otras de conservacion de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren, usados por ellos hasta el ultimo periodo de sus vidas para las visitas de orientacion y viajes al extranjero.
					
					El mismo dia, el Palacio fue visitado por los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los trabajadores de distintos estratos que honraron tambien a sus Lideres antecesores.

articles.title: Coreanos rinden tributo a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Coreanos rinden tributo a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 22o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, los funcionarios, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de distintos estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares de todo el pais visitaron las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y sus imagenes con amplia sonrisa erguidas en sus respectivas localidades del pais para rendirles tributo tras colocar cestos, ramos y ramitas de flores. 
					Ante las estatuas de bronce de los grandes Lideres en la capitalina colina Mansu estaba colocado un cesto de flores enviado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Alli fueron depositados cestos, ramos y ramitas de flores a nombre de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, unidades del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, las instituciones, empresas, fabricas, granjas, escuelas y otros a todos los niveles de esta capital.
					
					Tambien, fue puesto un cesto de flores a nombre de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Los participantes rindieron tributo a los grandes Lideres. 
					
					Las ceremonias de homenaje tuvieron lugar ante las estatuas de bronce y las imagenes sonrientes de los grandes Lideres en la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo, la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae, la Casa de Creacion Mansudae y otros lugares de esta capital.
